doc:
Marjorie Main https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marjorie_Main 0 Marjorie Main is the stage name of Mary Tomlinson (February 24, 1890 – April 10, 1975), was an American character actress and singer of the Classical Hollywood period, best known as a Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer contract player in the 1940s and 1950s, and for her role as Ma Kettle in ten Ma and Pa Kettle movies. Main started her career in vaudeville and theatre and appeared in films classics, such as Dead End (1937), Dark Command (1940), The Shepherd of the Hills (1941), Meet Me in St. Louis (1944), and Friendly Persuasion (1956). Marjorie_Main is the_stage_name of Mary_Tomlinson ( February_24_,_1890 – April_10_,_1975 ) , was an_American_character_actress_and_singer of the_Classical_Hollywood_period , best_known as a_Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer_contract_player in the_1940s_and_1950s , and for her_role as Ma_Kettle in ten_Ma_and_Pa_Kettle_movies . Main started her_career in vaudeville_and_theatre and appeared in films_classics , such_as Dead_End_(_1937_)_,_Dark_Command_(_1940_) , The_Shepherd of the_Hills_(_1941_) , Meet_Me in St._Louis_(_1944_) , and Friendly_Persuasion_(_1956_) .
